ROW.NAME: 核实任务
ROW.COLLIST: bilid 单号,yymm1 起始年月,yymm2 截止年月,cmid 企业编号, cmnam 企业名称,(select name from v_tax_trktyp where id=subtyp) 类型,to_char(crtdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') 创建时间,tousr 税管员,decode(stat,'1','未分派','2','已分派','3','已处理','4','关闭') 状态,to_char(chkdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') 分派时间,enddat 截止日期

ROW.DATDSC: select GUID from tax_trkhdr where bilid = '[%bilid]'
select filename, guid from formblob where formguid='[%GUID]'
select zipfile from tax_trkhdr where guid='[%GUID]'
